snippet: Air Force officials said an investigation has revealed instances of cheating on proficiency tests by officers with the responsibility to launch nuclear weapons.
abstract: Air Force officials report that 34 officers responsible for launching the nation's nuclear missiles have been suspended and their security clearances revoked for cheating on monthly proficiency tests that assess their knowledge of how to operate the warheads.
lead_paragraph: Air Force officials said an investigation has revealed instances of cheating on proficiency tests by officers with the responsibility to launch nuclear weapons.

headline.main: Cheating Accusations Among Officers Overseeing Nuclear Arms
headline.print_headline: Cheating Accusations Among Officers Overseeing Nuclear Arms

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
